ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Keyboard bindings info.
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought that was CTRL casting?  Does ALT work too? === Casting the spells from the spell gems by using the keyboard (instead of moving the gems to the
ygData.messageBody:
I thought that was CTRL casting? Does ALT work too?

===

Casting the spells from the spell gems by using the keyboard
(instead of moving the gems to the hotkeys, you can use ALT-1 to
cast the spell in the first spell slot...all the way through
ALT-8). It used to not work for bards, and when you used it, it
also tried actiivating the item/social/spell in that number
hotkey...both problems are fixed now : )

--Khelan

>>> <JESSICA_WEBBER@...> 11/16/00 10:19AM >>>


Thanks a million Khelen. One question though.

>2) ALT-casting now works for Bards

What's ALT-casting?

Peace
Evulia of Tunare
